channel.title: Blog of ltlnx - All pages
channel.description: All pages on the website of ltlnx

item.title: All Pages / Other Pages Demo
item.description: You can add Markdown files in the source directory without putting them under any category directory, and they would be classified under “Other Pages” (or if there’s no category, “All Pages”).

item.title: Test Post
item.description: This is a test post to demonstrate what the script would do to every post.
